channel.title: Compiler Help Please?
channel.description:
Hey Everyone, When I Try To Compile This Comes Up - Note: This Is For The Client Compiler [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/rj39ea.png[/img]
This is my compiler code: @echo off title Splitrush cls: build "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin\javac.exe" -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin src\server\event\*.java src\server\model\items\*.java src\server\model\minigames\*.java src\server\model\npcs\*.java src\server\model\objects\*.java src\server\model\players\*.java src\server\model\players\skills\*.java src\server\model\players\packets\*.java src\server\model\shops\*.java src\server\net\*.java src\server\task\*.java src\server\util\*.java src\server\world\*.java src\server\util\log\*.java src\server\*.java src\server\world\map\*.java src/server/gui/*.java pause
Help Plox?

item.title: Compiler Help Please?
item.dc:creator: @dylan.hurley dylan.hurley
item.description:
@dylan.hurley wrote:

you do not have permition to enter folder so just go to its location normal and run it normaly and it should work hope this helped

Read full topic

item.description:
@iiLovePVP wrote:

Same error where javac.exe is not a recognized command

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Help Please?
item.dc:creator: @ultimatepkvillage ultimatepkvillage
item.description:
@ultimatepkvillage wrote:

iiLovePVP:

could you just give me a code for my compiler so it will work?

k try this
@echo off
:menu
title Name of Compiler
echo Errors:
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\InternetExplorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Compiling Finished.
pause
exit

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler Help Please?

item.description:
@iiLovePVP wrote:

Could u please just tell me what I did wrong oh yeah updated compiler but same error where it says javac not recognized command.

New Compiler Code:
@echo off
title Splitrush
cls: build
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_27\bin\javac.exe” -classpath deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/jython.jar;deps/xstream.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/poi.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar -d bin
pause

item.description:

Hey Everyone, When I Try To Compile This Comes Up - Note: This Is For The Client Compiler
